content.question:
The x axis ranges from negative 5 to 7 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1. The ellipse intersects its horizontal line of symmetry at (negative 4 comma 0) and (6 comma 0). The ellipse intersects its vertical line of symmetry at (1 comma negative 2) and (1 comma 2).
The graph of an ellipse is shown in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. The ellipse is defined by the parametric function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> given by <math alttext="f open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses h plus a cos t comma k plus b sin t close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>sin</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> for <math alttext="0 less or equal than t less or equal than 2 pi"><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math>, where <math alttext="a"><mi>a</mi></math>, <math alttext="b"><mi>b</mi></math>, <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math>, and <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> are real numbers. What is the value of <math alttext="a"><mi>a</mi></math> ?

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
